#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<string>

using namespace std;

int main(){
int t,m1,w1,i,flag;
string m,w;
int *A;
cin>>t;
while(t--){
    m.clear();
    w.clear();
    cin>>m>>w;
    m1 = m.size();
    w1 = w.size();
    if(m1!=w1){
        cout<<"NO"<<endl;
        continue;
    }
    A = (int *)malloc(26*sizeof(int));
    for(i=0;i<26;++i){
        A[i] = 0;
    }
    for(i=0;i<m1;++i){
        (A[(m[i])-'a'])++;
    }
    for(i=0;i<w1;++i){
        (A[(w[i])-'a'])--;
    }
    flag = 0;
    for(i=0;i<26;++i){
        if(A[i]!=0){
            flag = 1;
            break;
        }
    }
    if(flag == 0){
        cout<<"YES"<<endl;
    }
    else{
        cout<<"NO"<<endl;
    }
}
return 0;
}
